name: SpaceVaders
description:
# SpaceVaders

SpaceVaders is a game written in Python.
1550 lines of Python code.
Sold w/ source code.

## Run It (All OS)
```
python SpaceVaders.py
```

## Make Executable And Run It
On Unix-like systems do:
```
chmod +x SpaceVaders.py
> ./SpaceVaders
```

## Help
- [mouse] Move around
- [mouse button 1] Shoot
- [p] Pause
- [escape] Quit
